name: Apprintable
description:
We are a team of creatives that have come together using our knowledge of client service and global supply chain management.

We understand the need for speed and better, more transparent pricing in the print and design industry and the lack of personalised service with our competitors.

The main reason our current client list extends to names such as Jagermeister, FIFA & Mars inc. is down to how we work with clients to understand their needs and help them reduce wastage in time and money.

We have created efficient ways for us to help clients manage their print such as Toolkits, our signature platform to allow clients to use fixed branded templates to order print for their companies across multiple departments.

Other tools currently in development include a proofing system to allow customers to see their products on a mockup, automated proofing and correcting on upload to save time, and a new product plan stretching with a range of over 1000 products.

team.name: Peter Haddad
team.bioHtml: Founder at iWood, inc & @Apprintable. Studied at @University of Hertfordshire

team.name: Elie Haddad
team.bioHtml: Project Design engineer, with multidisciplinary skills enabling me to work effectively with Product, Business and People

jobs.title: Content Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
At Apprintable we look after some of Europe's biggest brands, offering them print services, graphic & print design and brand marketing through B2B sales. We are now looking to grow our online content and looking for a content creator, someone that can bring new ideas to the table! We are stepping up our focus on content. You will be a crucial person in the performance of our marketing channels. We are on a mission to increase our website traffic that will be generated through content creation. We are already seeing great results through our efforts this year and with the right person on board, we can increase it even more!

Content is one of the biggest company-wide opportunities, this is an opportunity to grow and progress your career. During your time as a content intern, you will be guided by our team, made of web design and content manager. This is your chance to be part of a young team in our studio in West London, and also become an essential part of a rapidly growing e-commerce business.

What you will do
- Quality control of our current content, to ensure it is engaging and accurate.
- Product content, FAQs and a chance to increase your SEO knowledge.
- You will create blogs as well as discuss with potential platforms and bloggers to publishing the articles, you are fully in the lead.
- Create and implement a social media strategy across Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn and Youtube
- Create & publish articles, check blogs written by the rest of the team.
- You will join a young, creative and energetic team.
- Research content, for the roadmap and content campaigns!
- Be part of our daily creative hour where we brainstorm to come up with ideas for our next content campaign.


What we are looking for
- Fluent in writing and speaking English.
- A passion for creative content - you simply love to write
- Available for at least 3-6 months
- You have a great interest in both content and digital marketing;
- You have completed or are studying for a degree in Marketing, Business, Communication, Writing or any other relevant subject.
- You are a motivated self-starter with an entrepreneurial spirit.


What We Offer
- An excellent career opportunity.
- A steep learning curve, pick up SEO, competitive analysis with a big challenge to increase our product content and see the business grow.
- Be part of a young creative team, not afraid to take risks.
 
Immediate start. Ideal for someone looking to complete an internship and totally get immersed in the business.
 
Check us out at www.apprintable.com and let us know if you are up for the challenge!
